name: Cheque Printing Format
html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Payment Advice")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Voucher Date"), meteor.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Reference / Cheque No."), doc.cheque_no), (_("Reference / Cheque Date"), meteor.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date)) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("This amount is in full / part settlement of the listed bills") }}:

{%- for label, value in ( (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("References"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}
Prepared By
Authorised Signatory
Received Payment as Above
_____________
A/C Payee
_____________
{{ meteor.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date) }}
{{ doc.pay_to_recd_from }}
{{ doc.total_amount_in_words }}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total_amount") }}

name: Credit Note
html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Credit Note")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Credit To"), doc.pay_to_recd_from), (_("Date"), meteor.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("Remarks"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("For") }} {{ doc.company }},



{{ _("Authorized Signatory") }}

name: Offer Letter
html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, "Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !"

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{{ doc.terms }}

html:

" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("Remarks"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("For") }} {{ doc.company }},



{{ _("Authorized Signatory") }}

name: POS Invoice
html:
